section.title: &PRODUCTABBR; Core Entity Model
section.para: The &PRODUCT; Core Entity Model (CEM) is based on the Ed-Fi Unifying Data Model. &PRODUCT; maintains a one-to-one mapping between the two models for the majority of the entities. However, some Ed-Fi entities have been merged into a single entity or split into multiple entities in the &PRODUCTABBR; CEM.

The &COMPANYABBR; data ingestion subsystem, which handles bulk data additions and updates to the &COMPANYABBR; data store, uses Ed-Fi XML schemas as the primary format for the source data. To handle the differences between the &COMPANYABBR; CEM and the Ed-Fi data model, &COMPANYABBR; provides an Ed-Fi XML schema extension.
Deviations from Ed-Fi, and the entity-level mapping between the &COMPANYABBR; CEM and the Ed-Fi Unifying Data Model, are published in &PRODUCTABBR; ingestion documentation.
